attributes.action: encourage the Royal Bank of Scotland not to renew the loan for LFC in January
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Liverpool Football Club is currently owned by two American businessmen, Tom Hicks and George Gillet, who have lied to us supporters regarding club debt.

In January 2009 they are set to renew a refinancing deal which saw a multimillion pound debt fall onto LFC and its supporters are having to pay it off.  

I urge the Prime minister to discourage any such renewal to Force the owners to sell LFC back to its rightful owners...the Supporters

Please all fans support this petition

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
